    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    Controls the admin view of the photo album application.
    Album
    Represents an album in the photo album application.
    AlbumController
    Controls the album view of the photo album application.
    DataManager
    Handles serialization and deserialization of user data.
    LoginController
    Controls the login view of the photo album application.
    Photo
    Represents a photo in the photo album application.
    PhotoController
    Controls the photo view of the photo album application.
    Photos
    Represents the main application class for the photo album application.
    Tag
    Represents a tag in the photo album application.
    TagManager
    Manages the list of tag types in the photo album application.
    User
    Represents a user with a username and a list of albums.
    UserController
    Controls the user view of the photo album application.
    UsernamePromptController
    Controls the username prompt dialog.
